turns.content:
Marketing Plan: Building Multiple Streams of Income with Other People's Money 3-Day Challenge

Objective: To attract and engage potential customers who are interested in learning how to build multiple streams of income, improve their money mindset, and access other people's money to achieve financial freedom.

Target Audience: Individuals who are interested in personal finance and financial freedom, including those who are currently struggling with debt, seeking additional sources of income, or looking to invest for their future.

1. Pre-Challenge Awareness Campaign:
* Utilize social media platforms (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) to share teasers and create anticipation for the challenge
* Reach out to influencers and bloggers in the personal finance space to collaborate and promote the challenge
* Utilize email marketing to build a list of interested individuals and provide them with updates on the challenge
2. Live Launch Event:
* Host a virtual launch event for the 3-Day Challenge
* Invite potential customers to attend and experience a taste of the challenge
* Offer an exclusive discount for those who sign up during the event
3. Daily Challenge Deliverables:
* Deliver daily lessons, exercises, and activities via email to challenge participants
* Encourage participants to share their progress and experiences on social media
* Offer additional resources and support (e.g. live Q&A sessions, support groups) to keep participants engaged and motivated
4. Post-Challenge Follow-Up:
* Send follow-up emails to participants with additional resources and support
* Offer an upsell opportunity for those who want to continue their education and journey towards financial freedom
* Collect feedback from participants to improve future iterations of the challenge
5. Continuous Engagement:
* Utilize email marketing to provide participants with valuable resources and information
* Offer special promotions and discounts for future products and services
* Host regular webinars and events to continue the conversation and educate individuals on financial freedom.

Note: This marketing plan can be adapted and modified to fit the unique needs and goals of the course. The goal is to create a comprehensive and effective marketing strategy that reaches the target audience and drives conversions.
What should my offer include? Include the main offer, 2 order bumps and 2 upsells and 1 downsell offer

Offer: Building Multiple Streams of Income with Other People's Money 3-Day Challenge

Main Offer:

* Access to all lessons, exercises, and activities for the 3-Day Challenge
* Daily email delivery for the duration of the challenge
* Additional resources and support (e.g. live Q&A sessions, support groups)
* An opportunity to improve money mindset and create multiple streams of income
* A certificate of completion for the challenge

Order Bump #1:

* Access to a pre-recorded webinar on the "Secrets of Building Multiple Streams of Income with Other People's Money"
* A step-by-step guide to help implement what was learned in the challenge

Order Bump #2:

* A one-on-one coaching session with a financial expert
* Personalized support and guidance to help reach financial goals

Upsell #1:

* Access to a 6-week program to go deeper into creating financial freedom
* Includes lessons on investing, building generational wealth, and accessing other people's money

Upsell #2:

* A VIP membership to an exclusive online community
* Access to exclusive resources, webinars, and events
* Personalized support and accountability to help reach financial goals

Downsell Offer:

* Access to the 6-week program at a discounted rate
* Limited access to the online community and exclusive resources
* Personalized support and accountability to help reach financial goals.
Create a facebook ad for the 3 day challenge

Title: Unlock Your Financial Freedom in Just 3 Days!

Body: Are you tired of living paycheck to paycheck and struggling to make ends meet? It's time to take control of your finances and create multiple streams of income!

Join our 3-Day Challenge, "Building Multiple Streams of Income with Other People's Money" and learn how to:

* Revamp your money mindset
* Create multiple streams of income
* Access other people's money for your business

With daily email delivery, access to expert support, and a certificate of completion, this challenge is your chance to take your finances to the next level.

Sign up now and unlock your financial freedom!

CTA: "Start Your Journey to Financial Freedom Today!"

Note: Use eye-catching visuals that show people experiencing financial freedom and living their best lives. Use the right keywords and target the right audience to attract individuals who are interested in improving their finances.
Write an impressive opening on mindset for this 3 day challenge

Welcome to the "Building Multiple Streams of Income with Other People's Money" 3-Day Challenge!

We believe that your mindset is the foundation of your financial success, and that's why we've created this challenge specifically to help you develop the right money mindset.

Over the next three days, you'll have the opportunity to challenge your limiting beliefs about money and learn how to think like a millionaire. We'll teach you the secrets to creating multiple streams of income and accessing other people's money for your business, and show you how to turn your financial dreams into a reality.

This challenge is not just about learning new skills, it's about transforming the way you think about money. So, get ready to leave behind your old money habits and embrace a new, empowered, and abundant money mindset!

And with our daily email delivery, you'll have the support you need to stay on track and continue your growth even after the challenge has ended.

We understand that creating financial freedom can be a daunting task, but we believe in you. Our goal is to provide you with the tools, knowledge, and support you need to take control of your finances and build a brighter future for yourself and your loved ones.

So, buckle up and get ready for a life-changing experience. This is your chance to invest in yourself and take the first step towards financial freedom. Let's get started!
Create the 3 steps to have a transformational money mindset shift and write a paragraph on each

Step 1: Challenge Your Limiting Beliefs About Money
The first step towards a transformational money mindset shift is to challenge your limiting beliefs about money. Our beliefs about money shape our financial reality, and if those beliefs are limiting, they can hold us back from achieving our financial goals. During this step, you'll examine your own beliefs about money, and learn how to identify and replace limiting beliefs with empowering, abundant ones.

Step 2: Embrace a Growth Mindset
The second step is to embrace a growth mindset. A growth mindset is a belief that you can grow and develop your skills and abilities, and that you are capable of overcoming challenges and obstacles. This type of mindset is essential for financial success because it helps you take action, be resilient, and persist in the face of adversity.

Step 3: Cultivate an Abundant Mindset
The final step is to cultivate an abundant mindset. An abundant mindset is a belief that there is enough abundance in the world for everyone, and that you can have more than enough to live a happy, fulfilling life. This type of mindset shifts your focus from scarcity to abundance, and helps you attract more opportunities, abundance, and success into your life.

By following these three steps, you'll develop a transformational money mindset that empowers you to achieve financial freedom and build multiple streams of income. So, get ready to leave behind your old money habits and embrace a new, abundant, and empowering money mindset!
What is a intriguing quote for this step
"Your beliefs about money shape your bank account, so make sure your beliefs are worth having."
create 5 slides and the discussion for Step 2: Embrace a Growth Mindset

Slide 1: Introduction to Embracing a Growth Mindset

* In this step, we will discuss the power of a growth mindset and how it can help you achieve financial freedom.

Slide 2: What is a Growth Mindset

* A growth mindset is a belief that your abilities and intelligence can be developed through effort and experience.
* People with a growth mindset are more resilient, persistent, and open to new challenges and opportunities.

Slide 3: The Benefits of a Growth Mindset

* A growth mindset can lead to greater success and satisfaction in life, including financial success.
* People with a growth mindset are more likely to embrace challenges, learn from failure, and continuously improve their skills and knowledge.

Slide 4: How to Develop a Growth Mindset

* To develop a growth mindset, focus on learning, growth, and progress rather than perfection.
* Celebrate your failures as opportunities for growth, and embrace new challenges as opportunities to learn and grow.

Slide 5: Conclusion

* Embracing a growth mindset is key to achieving financial freedom and success.
* By focusing on learning, growth, and progress, you can develop a mindset that enables you to overcome obstacles, embrace challenges, and achieve your financial goals.

Discussion:

* Encourage the attendees to reflect on their current mindset and identify areas for improvement.
* Ask for examples of how a growth mindset has helped others achieve financial success.
* Discuss the benefits and steps for developing a growth mindset.
* Emphasize the importance of focusing on learning, growth, and progress in achieving financial freedom.
